tool_description: Tracks synchronization license usage in films, TV shows, commercials, and digital content by monitoring content databases and sync reporting systems.

sync_databases.description: Array of sync database names to search

track_identifiers.description: Track identifiers (ISRC, catalog numbers, or sync IDs)

search_period_months.description: Number of months to search back (1-60)

minimum_license_value.description: Minimum license value to include in results (USD)

production_companies.description: Specific production companies to focus on

verification_required.description: Flag suspicious entries for manual verification

exclude_expired_licenses.description: Exclude uses with expired synchronization licenses

error_messages: Database access error: Unable to connect to one or more sync databases. Verify database access credentials.
Invalid search period: Search period must be between 1-60 months.
Track limit exceeded: Maximum 5000 track identifiers per search. Split large searches into multiple calls.
Unsupported content type: Use supported types like film, tv_show, commercial, digital_video, game, podcast.
Invalid license value: Minimum license value must be non-negative number.
usage: Specify sync_databases, content_types, track_identifiers, and search_period_months. Configure optional filters for production companies, geographic markets, and license values to refine results.

total_sync_uses.description: Total number of synchronization uses found

total_license_value.description: Total estimated license value in USD

sync_usage_records.description: Detailed sync usage records with content and licensing information

unreported_potential.description: Number of potentially unreported sync uses identified
